item.title: Skillsoft Corp 10-K
item.description: Skillsoft Corp, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 18, 2022 had 52423 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 589 instances 2021 - 545 instances 2020 - 377 instances 31 - 374 instances january - 373 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
